name: aqua-suit
effect: Allows the player to ride Kyogre in the Cave of Origin.
short_effect: Allows the player to ride Kyogre in the Cave of Origin.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A suit made with the collective technological
know-how of Team Aqua. It can withstand
any impact.
